title: A Biker MC Got Me: Butch
description: A MC crushed by his long-time sweet-pea, a young girl who lives for trouble...a twisted love story in Montana!I'm Butch and I'm Kitty's play uncle. I work at her father Mac's bike shop. When she ran away from home,the young girl came looking for me.She shows up to the clubhouse pleading for me to help.Of course, I’m going to help her - I'd never turn away a woman.But with this girl, she wants more than a short stay at my place.I don't know.Her father is a crazy muthaf**** especially when he starts drinking. I've known the bastard for a long time. Her stepmom is a crazy a**, too.But Little Kitty won't stop … and don't wanna go home.What should I do?
author: Just Bae
